attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For far too long now there has been a nationwide shortage of Daddies brown sauce. Bacon buttys are just not the same without it. I say, enough is enough. It is time for action.

If you agree with my sentiments then please sign this petition. 

Your Daddies needs you !!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
